## [SlidesApp](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slides-app)

### Properties

|           Property           |                                                    Type                                                    |                                                              Description                                                              |
|------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `Alignment``Position`        | [AlignmentPosition](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/alignment-position)         | An enumeration of the types of alignment positions.                                                                                   |
| `Arrow``Style`               | [ArrowStyle](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/arrow-style)                       | An enumeration of the different arrow styles that a [Line](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/line) can have. |
| `Auto``Text``Type`           | [AutoTextType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/auto-text-type)                  | An enumeration of the types of auto text.                                                                                             |
| `Autofit``Type`              | [AutofitType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/autofit-type)                     | An enumeration of autofit types.                                                                                                      |
| `Cell``Merge``State`         | [CellMergeState](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/cell-merge-state)              | An enumeration of the different merge states of a table cell.                                                                         |
| `Color``Type`                | [ColorType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/base/color-type.html)                                | An enumeration of color types.                                                                                                        |
| `Content``Alignment`         | [ContentAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/content-alignment)           | An enumeration of values used to specify content alignment.                                                                           |
| `Dash``Style`                | [DashStyle](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/dash-style)                         | An enumeration of the different dash styles that a [Line](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/line) can have.  |
| `Fill``Type`                 | [FillType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/fill-type)                           | An enumeration of fill types.                                                                                                         |
| `Line``Category`             | [LineCategory](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/line-category)                   | An enumeration of the categories of [Line](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/line).                          |
| `Line``Fill``Type`           | [LineFillType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/line-fill-type)                  | An enumeration of the types of [LineFill](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/line-fill).                      |
| `Line``Type`                 | [LineType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/line-type)                           | An enumeration of the types of [Line](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/line).                               |
| `Link``Type`                 | [LinkType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/link-type)                           | An enumeration of the types of links.                                                                                                 |
| `List``Preset`               | [ListPreset](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/list-preset)                       | An enumeration of the types of list presets.                                                                                          |
| `Page``Background``Type`     | [PageBackgroundType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page-background-type)      | An enumeration of the types of page backgrounds.                                                                                      |
| `Page``Element``Type`        | [PageElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page-element-type)            | An enumeration of the types of page elements.                                                                                         |
| `Page``Type`                 | [PageType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/page-type)                           | An enumeration of the types of pages.                                                                                                 |
| `Paragraph``Alignment`       | [ParagraphAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/paragraph-alignment)       | An enumeration of the types of paragraph alignment.                                                                                   |
| `Placeholder``Type`          | [PlaceholderType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/placeholder-type)             | An enumeration of the types of placeholders.                                                                                          |
| `Predefined``Layout`         | [PredefinedLayout](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/predefined-layout)           | An enumeration of the predefined layouts.                                                                                             |
| `Selection``Type`            | [SelectionType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/selection-type)                 | An enumeration of the types of selections.                                                                                            |
| `Shape``Type`                | [ShapeType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/shape-type)                         | An enumeration of the types of shapes.                                                                                                |
| `Sheets``Chart``Embed``Type` | [SheetsChartEmbedType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/sheets-chart-embed-type) | An enumeration of Sheets chart embed types.                                                                                           |
| `Slide``Linking``Mode`       | [SlideLinkingMode](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slide-linking-mode)          | An enumeration of the ways Slides can be linked.                                                                                      |
| `Slide``Position`            | [SlidePosition](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slide-position)                 | An enumeration of the types of slide positions.                                                                                       |
| `Spacing``Mode`              | [SpacingMode](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/spacing-mode)                     | An enumeration of the types of spacing modes.                                                                                         |
| `Text``Baseline``Offset`     | [TextBaselineOffset](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/text-baseline-offset)      | An enumeration of the types of text baseline offset.                                                                                  |
| `Text``Direction`            | [TextDirection](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/text-direction)                 | An enumeration of the types of text directions.                                                                                       |
| `Theme``Color``Type`         | [ThemeColorType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/theme-color-type)              | An enumeration of theme colors.                                                                                                       |
| `Video``Source``Type`        | [VideoSourceType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/video-source-type)            | An enumeration of the types of video source.                                                                                          |

### Methods

|                                                              Method                                                              |                                                  Return type                                                  |                                                                                                            Brief description                                                                                                            |
|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [create(name)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slides-app#create(String))                             | [Presentation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/presentation)                       | Creates and opens a new [Presentation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/presentation).                                                                                                                        |
| [getActivePresentation()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slides-app#getActivePresentation())         | [Presentation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/presentation)                       | Returns the currently active presentation to which the script is [container-bound](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/scripts_containers), or `null` if there is no active presentation.                                         |
| [getUi()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slides-app#getUi())                                         | [Ui](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/base/ui.html)                                                  | Returns an instance of the presentation's user-interface environment that allows the script to add features like menus, dialogs, and sidebars.                                                                                          |
| [newAffineTransformBuilder()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slides-app#newAffineTransformBuilder()) | [AffineTransformBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/affine-transform-builder) | Returns a new [AffineTransformBuilder](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/affine-transform-builder) to build an [AffineTransform](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/affine-transform). |
| [openById(id)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slides-app#openById(String))                           | [Presentation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/presentation)                       | Opens the [Presentation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/presentation) with the given ID.                                                                                                                    |
| [openByUrl(url)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/slides-app#openByUrl(String))                        | [Presentation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/presentation)                       | Opens the [Presentation](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/presentation) with the given URL.                                                                                                                   |
